topic.title: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE COMMISSIONED SERVICES INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG) authorises another ORGANISATION to exercise any of its NHS Continuing Healthcare functions on its behalf, for example, Commissioning Support Unit (CSU), NHS Trust, section 75 arrangement with Local Authority.
